highlights: Designed and implemented an Abstract Base Class (ABC) that outlines a RelateIQ integration
Implemented a MailChimp-RelateIQ integration that inherits from the ABC
Rewrote existing integrations to inherit from ABC

organizations.name: ACM SIGCoin
organizations.summary: Association for Computing Machinery Special Interest Group for crypto-currencies and their implications for finance and the economy.

projects.title: Bitcoin Autotrader
projects.summary: I created a program that would algorithmically place Bitcoin trades based on the calculation and comparison of moving averages. The program is currently configured to use Bitstamp's API.

projects.title: Dinner Selector
projects.summary: Java application to settle disagreements over where to eat dinner. Database of restaurants was customizable by user and categorized by price range. User would input his/her price range and the app would randomly select a restaurant in that range.

awards.title: Illinois State Scholar
awards.summary: Recognizes students attending approved high schools for outstanding academic achievement, provides honorary recognition with no monetary award. Approximately the top 10% of graduates from approved high schools are announced as State Scholars each year.

awards.title: Presidential Award Program
awards.summary: High achieving newly admitted freshmen from several underrepresented groups are eligible for consideration for the PAP award. Requirements: rank in the top 40% of the high school class and an ACT composite score of 25 or higher
